articles.author: Rebecca Sun
articles.title: Sacheen Littlefeather Dead: Actress Who Delivered Brando Oscar Speech Was 75 - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actress and Native American activist says her Hollywood career was ruined after she spoke for the actor at the 1973 Academy Awards.
articles.content: Sacheen Littlefeather (Apache/Yaqui/Ariz.), the Native American actress and activist who took to the stage at the 1973 Academy Awards to reveal that Marlon Brando would not accept his Oscar for The G… [+10052 chars]
